Blood 9

Send Horror
Ritual
B4S5
spell id [id]: 1123
effect number [effect_number]: 38
damage [damage]: -7
range [provrange]: 6 provinces
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 30B
Remote Summon (Temporary units):Horror
Percent to horror mark caster:40
The caster contacts and forces a Horror to attack a distant province. The Horror will annihilate any army that is not hiding inside a fortress before disappearing. Dealing with horrors is not without risk however and the caster of this ritual might attract some unwanted attention.
